amendment.description: Amendment adds to the bill the environmental streamlining provisions from Title III of the American Energy and Infrastructure Jobs Act (H.R. 7).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-446 to add to the bill the environmental streamlining provisions from Title III of the American Energy and Infrastructure Jobs Act (H.R. 7).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ribble amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 255 - 165 (Roll no. 168).
